title: The Yoke Upon Your Shoulders
itunes:title: The Yoke Upon Your Shoulders
description: What is it like to have Christ for a king? All three of this Sunday's readings examine this very question in some way. The answer is to submit to his kingship and accept his yoke upon your shoulders to make your life an offering to his plan.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
